mapper.sql: select s.student_id, student_name, student_gender, student_birthday, student_register, student_belong from student s
mapper.update: update student set student_name = #{studentName}, student_gender = #{studentGender}, student_birthday = #{studentBirthday}, student_register = #{studentRegister}, student_belong = #{studentBelong} where student_id = #{studentId}
mapper.select: select s.student_id, student_name, student_gender, student_birthday, student_register, student_belong from score c left join student s on c.student_id = s.student_id where c.course_id = #{courseId}
